mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification ( user_id, notification_type, title, content, related_id, related_type, is_read, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{notificationType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{relatedId}, #{relatedType}, 0, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notification WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE notification SET is_read = 1, read_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notification WHERE create_time < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY)
